values: To adhere means to act in the way that a rule or agreement says is right.
If the new employees wish to succeed, they must adhere to the boss’s rules.
v. to give support or maintain loyalty 遵守
vi. 黏附, 附着坚持, 支持
时态:adhered, adhering, adheres
